table.caption: Frost Giant Bag Items
rows: A large bronze bell with no clapper
A giant-sized wineskin, half-filled with wine frozen to slush
A necklace made of griffon beaks and skulls
The jagged claw of a white dragon with ice still riming its tip
A giant-sized fur cloak, ripped and patched in multiple places
A rusty longsword used to skin animals
A sack of dried meat strips, with "Wolf Treats" stitched in Giant on the front
Three ivory tusks, each worth 10 gp
Two polar bear pelts, each worth 20 gp
A massive, gold-tipped war horn worth 50 gp
Five large blue quartz gems, each worth 25 gp
table.name: Frost Giant Bag Contents; Frost Giant Bag Items
